sentences.translation: 旧时的自我约束是至关重要的。

sentences.sentence: This newspaper offers an unfashionably optimistic answer.
sentences.translation: 本报给出了一个并不普遍的乐观答案。

sentences.sentence: Professor Pinker (unfashionably) praises United Nations peacekeeping.
sentences.translation: 平克教授(不出所料地)称赞了美国在维护和平方面的表现。
